reviewText:
Outstanding book on prayer.  We used it with about 100 parishioners and they still comment on how good it was.
I agree. Thanks.
a great way to learn to pray!

Anyone desiring a deeper relationship with Christ should have these DVDs in their arsenal. I'm doing this series alone right now and am finding it very beneficial. It would probably be even more fruitful for me to watch the DVDs in a group setting. This series is truly inspired!
Oremus will teach you how to hear God's voice in prayer.  Absolutely the most amazing study I have ever participated in.  It will change your life.
